Vigilance
Whenever Underpass Sentinel enters or attacks, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control without one.
Sacrifice Underpass Sentinel: Embattled creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. [i](A creature is embattled if it has a counter on it or has a permanent you control attached to it.)[/i]
